summary.description: Determining the serotype composition of mixed samples of pneumococcus using whole genome sequencing | Pneumococcal serotype quantification using NGS reads | SeroCall can identify and quantitate the capsular serotypes in Illumina whole-genome sequencing samples of S. pneumoniae, calculating abundances of each serotype in mixed cultures. The software is written in Python (compatible with Python 2 or 3), and is freely available under an open source GPLv3 license
summary.name: SeroCall
